mapper.select: select * from movie where movieDelYn = 'N' and movieMenu = 1 order by movieNo desc limit 10;
select * from movie where movieDelYn = 'N' and movieMenu = 2 order by movieNo desc limit 10;
select * from file where fileDelYn = 'N' order by fileNo desc limit 10;
select movieNo from movie where title = #{title} and movieDelYn = 'N' order by movieNo desc limit 1;
mapper.insert: insert into movie (movieMenu, age, title, `release`, director, zenre, showtime, summary) values (#{movieMenu},#{age},#{title},#{release},#{director},#{zenre},#{showtime},#{summary});
insert into file (movieNo, fileName, fileUrl, regDate) values (#{movieNo},#{fileName},#{fileUrl},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'));
insert into mark (userNo, movieNo, mark) values (#{userNo},#{movieNo},#{mark});
mapper.select: Select * from mark where userNo = #{userNo} and movieNo = #{movieNo};
select count(*) as people, sum(mark) as point from mark where movieNo = #{movieNo};
mapper.update: update movie set movieDelYn = 'Y' where movieNo = #{movieNo};
update file set fileDelYn = 'Y' where movieNo = #{movieNo};
